entry.title: What Makes A Data Visualisation Elegant?
entry.quote: How do people define and describe elegance in visualisation as well as other creative or communicated work?

entry.title: Why Aren’t Cancer Drugs Better? The Targets Might Be Wrong
entry.quote: Drugs can stop cancer cells if they attack the right proteins. But many of these targets were chosen with dated, imprecise technology, a new study suggests.

entry.title: The iPhone and Apple's Services Strategy
entry.quote: It does feel like there is one more shoe yet to drop when it comes to Apple’s strategic shift. The fact that Apple is bundling a for-pay service (Apple TV+) with a product purchase is interesting, but what if Apple started included products with paid subscriptions?
